Maps were made with the pacakges marmap [@marmap2013], ggmap [@ggmap2013], maps [@R-maps], mapdata [@R-mapdata], sf [@sf2018], rnaturalearth [@R-rnaturalearth], rnaturalearthdata [@R-rnaturalearthdata], lattice [@lattice2008].
Analyses used the packages usdm [@usdm2014] as well as functionalities from R [@R-base], tidyverse [@tidyverse2019], dplyr [@R-dplyr], stringr [@R-stringr], kableExtra [@R-kableExtra], GridExtra [@R-gridExtra], ggrepel [@R-ggrepel], reshape2 [@], knitr [@knitr2015], Rmarkadown [@rmarkdown2018] and bookdown [@R-bookdown].
